page.title: 01WHO'S WHERE HERE
page.content: We start off at the BROICH set high on the hillside Then down by DEANSTON FARM where the young {McEWANS}bide. {SANDY HENDERSON's}at WATSTON then along by CAUSEWAYEND {DAVID BROWN}is at the SAUCHANS with GREENBURN round the bend. The {HUTTONS}at CARDONA then LOCHFIELD & DRUMMORE, BOGHALL & UPPER SPITTALTON with {JOHN BURNETT}to the fore. {MILLARS}live at CUPTREE,at MACKEANSTON it's the{GRAYS}- over now TO BANKHEAD where {SIR JOHN MUIR}lives these days. We pass the MELDRUM FARM where {PATERSONS}do bide and take the road to DEANSTON along the riverside. The village where the people used to work the cotton mill But now even the distillery has come to a standstill.
